title: The Bittersweet
description: Mara longs to escape the harsh city she grew up in. Plagued by disease and death, New York City was the last to fall to the war against Human Nature. Mara and her sick, crippled mother seek refuge in solitude, out of the city. But there are crazed groups of violent gangs and religious cults just as harsh, perhaps even worse than the gangs.
author: Ana Patrick
